item.description:
So you wanna go COUNTRY...well here's your chance!

We're going to the RANCH...Cadillac Ranch, that is! Good music, good dancing, great company. Join us Saturday, March 27th for alot of fun with those fabulous cowboys and cowgirls. If you like to line dance, this is the place.

So wear your boots, hats and get all decked out ...'cause WE'RE GOING COUNTRY!!!

* We will meet at 8 pm if you are interested in line dancing lessons or want to grab a bite...otherwise, come when you can!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Whoopin' It Up @ Cadillac Ranch!
